Trigger.name: Follow
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == ogleader then ognote("FOLLOW "..string.upper(matches[3])) ognote("'foll' to follow!") end

Trigger.name: Shield
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == ogleader then ognote("SHIELD") ognote("SHIELD") ognote("SHIELD") end

Trigger.name: Got to room
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == ogleader then leader_room = string.match(matches[3], "(%d%d%d+)") if leader_room then cechoLink("\n<green><GROUP UP, click to travel>", [[send("path walk "..leader_room)]], "GoTo", true ) cechoLink("\n<green><GROUP UP, click to travel>", [[send("path walk "..leader_room)]], "GoTo", true ) end end

Trigger.name: Health
Trigger.script: local percent = math.floor((100/tonumber(matches[3])) * tonumber(matches[2])) local width = math.floor((percent * 30) / 100) cecho("\n<maroon>"..string.rep([[|]], width).."<red>" ..string.rep("-", 30 - width).."<slate_grey> "..percent.."% health")

regexCodeList.string: ^\w+'s health stands at (\d+)/(\d+)\.$

Trigger.name: Mana
Trigger.script: local percent = math.floor((100/tonumber(matches[3])) * tonumber(matches[2])) local width = math.floor((percent * 30) / 100) cecho("\n<blue>"..string.rep([[|]], width).."<light_blue>" ..string.rep("-", 30 - width).."<slate_grey> "..percent.."% mana")

regexCodeList.string: ^\w+'s mana stands at (\d+)/(\d+)\.$

Trigger.name: Ego
Trigger.script: local percent = math.floor((100/tonumber(matches[3])) * tonumber(matches[2])) local width = math.floor((percent * 30) / 100) cecho("\n<green>"..string.rep([[|]], width).."<spring_green>" ..string.rep("-", 30 - width).."<slate_grey> "..percent.."% ego")

regexCodeList.string: ^\w+'s ego stands at (\d+)/(\d+)\.$

Trigger.name: Toad
Trigger.script: overgrow(string.upper(""..matches[2]).." TOADED") overgrow(string.upper(""..matches[2]).." TOADED") if matches[2] == string.lower(target) then segtell(""..matches[2] .." has been toaded!") end

regexCodeList.string: ^Deciding to teach ([A-Z][a-z]+) the ultimate lesson in manners\, you point a finger imperiously at [Hh](?:im|er) and call the curse of the toad down upon [Hh](?:is|er) head\. You watch in satisfaction as warts break out over [Hh](?:is|er) skin which then turns green and slimy\. Finally, [Ss]?[Hh]e shrinks and transforms into a large\, ugly toad\!$

^Eyes flashing with anger\, [A-Z][a-z]+ points a finger imperiously at ([A-Z][a-z]+) and utters a series of guttural croaks\. You watch in amazement as warts break out over [A-Z][a-z]+\'s skin which then turns green and slimy\. Finally\, [Ss]?[Hh]e shrinks and transforms into a large\, ugly toad\!$

Trigger.name: You got toaded
Trigger.script:
cecho("
<purple>+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+") cecho("
<purple>") cecho("
<purple>TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED") cecho("
<purple>TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED") cecho("
<purple>TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED") cecho("
<purple>TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED") cecho("
<purple>") cecho("
<purple>+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+")

regexCodeList.string: ^Eyes flashing with anger\, [A-Z][a-z]+ points a finger imperiously at you and utters a series of guttural croaks\. A strange thrumming fills your stomach\, and you watch in horror as warts break out over your skin which then turns green and slimy\. The world seems to suddenly become much larger\.\.\.or are you becoming smaller\? Hmm\, why do you have a sudden craving for flies\?$

Trigger.name: Decap
Trigger.script: OGcaution(matches[2],"started DECAPITATE") segtell(string.upper(""..matches[2]).." has begun a DECAPITATE") ogquicktarget = stringlower(""..matches[2]) ognote("Quicktarget set to "..matches[2])

regexCodeList.string: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) raises .*? over [Hh](?:is|er) head and begins to swing it in a wide circle\, gaining speed as [Ss]?[Hh]e goes\.$

Trigger.name: Decap2
Trigger.script: OGwarning(matches[2],"DECAPITATING "..matches[3].."! VINE WEB or GUST!!") segtell(string.upper(""..matches[2]).." has DECAPITATE on "..string.upper(""..matches[2]).."!") ogquicktarget = string.lower(""..matches[2]) ognote("Quicktarget set to "..matches[2])

regexCodeList.string: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) begins to bear down on ([A-Z][a-z]+)\, whirling .*?\.$

<red>DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP") cecho("
<red>DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP") cecho("
<red>") cecho("
<red>+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+")

regexCodeList.string: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) begins to bear down on you\, whirling .*?\.$

Trigger.name: Soulless
Trigger.script:
if matches[3] == "you" then cecho("
<red>+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+") cecho("
<red>") cecho("
<red>SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS") cecho("

<red>SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS") cecho("

<red>") cecho("
<red>+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+") else OGwarning(matches[2],"SOULLESS.") segtell(string.upper(""..matches[2]).." has SOULLESS on "..matches[3]..".") ogquicktarget = string.lower(""..matches[2]) ognote("Quicktarget set to "..matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) flings a tarot card at (\w+) and upon impact\, it disappears\. An ominous silence overtakes your surroundings\.$

Trigger.name: Chasm
Trigger.script: cecho("<yellow>+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+") cecho("<yellow>") cecho("<yellow>CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM") cecho("<yellow>CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM") cecho("<yellow>CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM") cecho("<yellow>CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM") cecho("<yellow>") cecho("<yellow>+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+")

regexCodeList.string: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) points at the tainted earth beneath your feet\, snarling with a look of madness on [Hh](?:is|er) face\. The ground begins to tremble\.$

Trigger.name: Chasm2
Trigger.script: cecho("<red>+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+") cecho("<red>") cecho("<red>CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM") cecho("<red>CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM") cecho("<red>CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM") cecho("<red>CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM") cecho("<red>") cecho("<red>+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+")

regexCodeList.string: ^([A-Z][a-z]+)\'s finger trembles and [Ss]?[Hh]e bares [Hh](?:is|er) teeth in a hideous grimace\. A small crack appears in the ground beneath you\!$

Trigger.name: Judge
Trigger.script: OGwarning(matches[2],"JUDGING.") segtell(string.upper(""..matches[2]).." is JUDGING "..matches[3]..".") ogquicktarget = string.lower(matches[3]) ognote("Quicktarget set to "..matches[3])

regexCodeList.string: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) calls down a beam of brilliant light upon (\w+)\.$

Trigger.name: highjumped
Trigger.script: OGcaution("%2","HIGHJUMPED")

regexCodeList.string: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) crouches low to the ground and stares at the sky\, suddenly leaping up above as [Ss]?[Hh]e grabs ([A-Z][a-z]+) flying overhead\, flinging [Hh](?:im|er) towards the ground\.$

Trigger.name: highjump2
Trigger.script: OGcaution(""..matches[2],"HIGHJUMPED") segtell(string.upper(""..matches[2]).." was HIGHJUMPED.")

regexCodeList.string: ^Discerning ([A-Z][a-z]+) flying high above\, you lie in wait until [Ss]?[Hh]e is directly overhead before jumping high into the air and grabbing firmly onto [Hh](?:is|er) torso\. A look of surprise crosses [Hh](?:is|er) features as you fling [Hh](?:im|er) forcefully at the ground\.$

Trigger.name: spring trap
Trigger.script: overgrow(""..matches[2].." flung in! QT to target!!","cyan") ogquicktarget = matches[2]

regexCodeList.string: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) comes arcing into the room and lands with a loud thump\.$

Trigger.name: p5
Trigger.script: OGcaution("%1","PFIFTHED!!! BLANKNOTE or HINDER")

regexCodeList.string: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) gazes longingly at (\w+)\.$

Trigger.name: Squall
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == "west" then dir = "east" elseif matches[2] == "northwest" then dir = "southeast" elseif matches[2] == "north" then dir = "south" elseif matches[2] == "northeast" then dir = "southwest" elseif matches[2] == "east" then dir = "west" elseif matches[2] == "southeast" then dir = "northwest" elseif matches[2] == "south" then dir = "north" elseif matches[2] == "southwest" then dir = "northeast" elseif matches[2] == "in" then dir = "out" elseif matches[2] == "out" then dir = "in" elseif matches[2] == "up" then dir = "down" elseif matches[2] == "down" then dir = "up" else dir = "back" end overgrow("SQUALLED!!! GO "..string.upper(dir).."! GO "..string.upper(dir).."! GO "..string.upper(dir).."!", "yellow")

regexCodeList.string: ^The foul wind picks you up and hurls you to the (\w+)\.$

Trigger.name: Seized
Trigger.script: if is_target(matches[2]) then overgrow("Target gone: Seized. CLIMB UP! CLIMB UP!") end

regexCodeList.string: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ locks [Hh](?:is|er) arms around ([A-Z][a-z]+) and the two vanish up and out of sight\.$

Trigger.name: Seized2
Trigger.script: if is_target(matches[2]) then overgrow("Target returned: Seized") end

regexCodeList.string: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ swings down below the canopy and re\-emerges with [Hh](?:is|er) arms clasped around ([A-Z][a-z]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Seized3
Trigger.script: overgrow(""..matches[2].." SEIZED!!")

regexCodeList.string: ^Your arms lock themselves about ([A-Z][a-z]+) and you hoist [Hh](?:im|er)\, legs kicking wildly\, up into the treetops\.$

Trigger.name: Shove
Trigger.script: if is_target(matches[2]) then overgrow("Target gone: Shoved. CLIMB DOWN! CLIMB DOWN!") end

regexCodeList.string: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ gives a vicious shove to ([A-Z][a-z]+)\, who falls backwards through the tree branches\.$
^You give ([A-Z][a-z]+) a vicious shove and watch in satisfaction as [Ss]?[Hh]e suffers a horrible fall\.$

Trigger.name: Levitate
Trigger.script: if is_target(matches[2]) then overgrow("Target returned: Levitating") end

regexCodeList.string: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) gently floats to the ground\.$

Trigger.name: Climb
Trigger.script: if is_target(matches[2]) then overgrow("Target gone: Trees. CLIMB UP! CLIMB UP!") end

regexCodeList.string: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) reaches up and grabs a sturdy branch\, then pulls [Hh](?:im|er)self up and disappears into the treetops\.$

Trigger.name: climb2
Trigger.script: if is_target(matches[2]) then overgrow("Target returned: Climbed down") end

regexCodeList.string: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) clambers down from a nearby vantage point in the treetops\.$

Trigger.name: Treelife
Trigger.script: if is_target(matches[2]) then overgrow("Target caught by Treelife!") end

regexCodeList.string: ^Animated branches from the trees above suddenly reach down and clutch ([A-Z][a-z]+)(?:\, riding .+?\,)? around the waist\, pulling [hH](?:im|er) into their foliage\.$
^Branches swoop down and lift ([A-Z][a-z]+) up into the trees\.$

Trigger.name: Treebane
Trigger.script: if is_target(matches[2]) then overgrow("Target gone: Treebane. CLIMB DOWN! CLIMB DOWN!") end

regexCodeList.string: ^The bough that ([A-Z][a-z]+) is standing on suddenly tilts and branches forcibly hurl him out of the tree\, sending him tumbling to the forest floor\.$

Trigger.name: Tree fall
Trigger.script: if is_target(matches[2]) then overgrow("Target gone: Tree fall. CLIMB DOWN! CLIMB DOWN!") end

regexCodeList.string: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) is suddenly rocked by a strong gust of wind\, and falls head first to the ground\.$
^([A-Z][a-z]+) is blown\, flailing\, out of the tree\.$

Trigger.name: Tumble somersault roll
Trigger.script: if is_target(matches[2]) then if string.find(matches[3], "tumble") then overgrow(""..matches[2].." is tumbling "..matches[4], "cyan") segtell(""..matches[2] .." is tumbling "..matches[4].."!") elseif string.find(matches[3], "somersault") then overgrow(""..matches[2].." is somersaulting "..matches[4], "cyan") segtell(""..matches[2] .." is somersaulting "..matches[4].."!") elseif string.find(matches[3], "roll") then overgrow(""..matches[2].." is rolling "..matches[4], "cyan") segtell(""..matches[2] .." is rolling "..matches[4].."!") end end

regexCodeList.string: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) (begins to tumble towards|prepares to somersault to|begins to roll towards) the (\w+)\.$

Trigger.name: Tumbled out
Trigger.script: if is_target(matches[2]) then overgrow("Target gone: Tumbled "..string.upper("%2").."!","cyan") end

regexCodeList.string: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) tumbles out to the (\w+)\.$
^([A-Z][a-z]+) jumps up and tucks [hH](?:im|er)self into a somersault\, diving past obstructions to the (\w+)\.$

Trigger.name: rad out
Trigger.script: if is_target(matches[2]) then overgrow("Target gone: RAD RUNE") end

regexCodeList.string: ^Blinking in astonishment\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) disappears in a flash of light\.$

Trigger.name: rad in
Trigger.script: if is_target(matches[2]) then overgrow("Target returned: RAD RUNE") end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) appears in a flash of light\, blinking in astonishment\.$

Trigger.name: sap
Trigger.script: local who = matches[2] local sapped = matches[3] segtell(""..who.." sapped "..sapped.."!")

regexCodeList.string: ^With a grim smile, (?:you[A-Z][a-z]?) touche?s? the trees and sap courses out in a thick syrup that lunges at ([A-Z][a-z]+)\, coating [Hh](?:im|er) in the viscid liquid\.$

Trigger.name: Cleanse
Trigger.script: segtell(""..matches[2].." has cleansed sap!")

regexCodeList.string: ([A-Z][a-z]+) rubs .*? and it begins to glow with a pulsating light\.$\n^Warm water showers down upon [Hh](?:im|er)\, and [Ss]?[Hh]e scrubs under [Hh](?:is|er) armpits trying to wash away that sticky sap.$
^Warm water showers down upon ([A-Z][a-z]+)\, who scrubs under [Hh](?:is|er) armpits trying to wash away that sticky sap\.$
^([A-Z][a-z]+) begins to vigorously scrub [Hh](?:im|er)self all over\, trying to remove the sticky sap coating [Hh](?:is|er) body\.$

Trigger.script:
if matches[3] == "you" then cecho("

<yellow>") cecho("
<yellow>+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+") else segtell(string.upper(""..matches[2]).." has begun DEATHSONG.") ogquicktarget = matches[2] ognote("Quicktarget set to "..matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^\".+?\" sings ([A-Z][a-z]+)\, (?:somber notes tumbling out of .+?|as .+? plays deep\, dark melodies|tragically playing .+? with a mournful thrum|while .+? lets loose with screaming melodies)\, and [Ss]?[Hh]e looks directly at (.*?)\.$

Trigger.name: New Trigger
Trigger.script:
cecho("
<red>+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+") cecho("
<red>") cecho("
<red>DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG") cecho("
<red>DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG") cecho("
<red>DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG") cecho("
<red>DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG") cecho("
<red>") cecho("
<red>+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+") segtell(string.upper(""..matches[2]).." has DEATHSONG on me! GUST them now!")

regexCodeList.string: ^Clasping [Hh](?:is|er) hands to [Hh](?:is|er) breast\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) sings to you\, wishing you well on your journey to the Halls of the Fates\. A white light surrounds [Hh](?:im|er) as the voices of an angelic choir join [Hh](?:is|er) in this somber hymn\.$

^The throat of ([A-Z][a-z]+) undulates and warbles as [Ss]?[Hh]e continues to maintain the moaning note of [Hh](?:is|er) song\. Ominous black shadows rise out of the ground\, slowly circling around you\.$

^Sweat breaks out on ([A-Z][a-z]+)'s forehead, as [Ss]?[Hh]e continues to maintain the screaming note of [Hh](?:is|er) song\. Ghostly spiked bands materialize around you\, which slowly begin to spin and screech like rusty iron cogs\.$

^([A-Z][a-z]+)\'s eyes roll up in [Hh](?:is|er) head\, as [Ss]?[Hh]e sings a throbbing note\. Unseen drums begin to beat and invisible spirits begin to chant\, as mists rise up from the ground and swirl around you\.$

Trigger.name: summon1
Trigger.script: overgrow("SUMMONING","white")

regexCodeList.string: ^You stumble as you feel invisible strands of force wrap around you\, followed by a high\-pitched thrum\.$

Trigger.name: aethersight
Trigger.script: local name = string.gsub(matches[2], "You sense ", "") name = string.gsub(name, " pulling on the strands of aether surrounding you", "") overgrow(name.." SUMMONING YOU","red")

regexCodeList.string: You sense (\w+) pulling on the strands of aether surrounding you\.$

Trigger.name: summon2
Trigger.script: local summoned = matches[2] overgrow(summoned.." BEING SUMMONED","white")

regexCodeList.string: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) suddenly stumbles as the air is filled with a high-pitched thrum\.$

Trigger.name: New Trigger
Trigger.script: local summoned = matches[3] local name = matches[2] name = string.gsub(name, " pulling on the strands of aether surrounding "..summoned, "") overgrow(string.upper(name).." SUMMONING "..string.upper(summoned),"red") segtell(name.." is summoning "..summoned)

regexCodeList.string: ^You sense (\w+) pulling on the strands of aether surrounding (\w+)\.$
^[A-Z][a-z]+ raises [Hh](?:is|er) arms and hums deeply the note of the forest\, which breaks into a discordant tone\.

^[A-Z][a-z]+ presses [Hh](?:is|er) lips together and makes a buzzing sound\. S?[Hh]e then opens [Hh](?:is|er) mouth and vomits forth a stream of swarming locusts that greedily infest the surrounding land and gorge themselves until they bloat\.$

Trigger.name: Taint
Trigger.script:
cecho("
<darkred>|-------------------------TAINTED TAINTED TAINTED TAINTED-------------------------|") cecho("
<darkred>|-------------------------TAINTED TAINTED TAINTED TAINTED-------------------------|") cecho("
<darkred>|-------------------------TAINTED TAINTED TAINTED TAINTED-------------------------|")

regexCodeList.string: Slowly raising [Hh](?:is|er) arms above [Hh](?:is|er) head\, [A-Z][a-z]+ shouts a guttural phrase that causes the ground to rumble\. Tendrils of black smoke rise up from the earth and choke the life out of the surrounding foliage\, which shrivels up and becomes brittle\.$

^Thick\, oily smoke pours out of the mouth of [A-Z][a-z]+ and creates an ankle\-deep carpet of seething black fog\. As the smoke is soaked into the ground\, the area turns putrid and foul\. This location is now tainted\.$
^(?:You|[A-Z][a-z]+) raises? (?:[Hh](?:is|er)|your) arms and hums? deeply the note of the forest\.
^[A-Z][a-z]+ takes a deep breath\, then slowly breathes out\, as the temperature in the room falls and banks of clouds roll in

Trigger.name: Flooded
Trigger.script:
cecho("
<navy>|-----------------------FLOODED FLOODED FLOODED FLOODED-----------------------|") cecho("
<navy>|-----------------------FLOODED FLOODED FLOODED FLOODED-----------------------|") cecho("
<navy>|-----------------------FLOODED FLOODED FLOODED FLOODED-----------------------|")

regexCodeList.string: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ spins slowly around in a circle(?: and water bubbles up from the ground\, flooding the area\.|\, causing water to bubble and froth\, becoming pure and clean\.)$

^After rubbing [Hh](?:is|er) hands together\, [A-Z][a-z]+ pulls them apart and releases thousands of glowing red sparks that whirl around [Hh](?:im|er) in a chaotic dance before flaring into small flames that spread out across the expanse of the location

Trigger.name: AeroMeld
Trigger.script:
cecho("
<dodger_blue>|------------------------------MELD MELD MELD MELD----------------------------|") cecho("
<dodger_blue>|------------------AEROMANCER AEROMANCER AEROMANCER AEROMANCER----------------|") cecho("
<dodger_blue>|------------------------------MELD MELD MELD MELD----------------------------|")

regexCodeList.string: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ sweeps the air with [Hh](?:is|er) hand and [Hh](?:is|er) eyes glow with a phosphorescent blue\.$
^[A-Z][a-z]+ stomps on the ground and [Hh](?:is|er) eyes shine with an eerie red glow\.$

^[A-Z][a-z]+ kneels down and touches [Hh](?:is|er) forehead to the earth\, then whispers softly\. A deep emerald glow ripples across the ground and [A-Z][a-z]+\'s eyes momentarily flash with a matching emerald light\.$

Trigger.name: PyroMeld
Trigger.script:
cecho("
<dark_orange>|------------------------------MELD MELD MELD MELD----------------------------|") cecho("
<dark_orange>|------------------PYROMANCER PYROMANCER PYROMANCER PYROMANCER----------------|") cecho("
<dark_orange>|------------------------------MELD MELD MELD MELD----------------------------|")

regexCodeList.string: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ claps [Hh](?:is|er) hands and [Hh](?:is|er) head is momentarily wreathed with a crown of flames\.$

Trigger.name: BlackTalon
Trigger.script:
cecho("
<medium_orchid>|------------------------------MELD MELD MELD MELD----------------------------|") cecho("
<medium_orchid>|------------------BLACKTALON BLACKTALON BLACKTALON BLACKTALON----------------|") cecho("
<medium_orchid>|------------------------------MELD MELD MELD MELD----------------------------|")

regexCodeList.string: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ crouches low and looses a terrifying\, raucous cry that echoes through the air\, the shadows writhing and whispering with a seething\, malevolent will\. A horrific mauve light twists across the ground\, the plant\-life shuddering violently in response\.$
^([A-Z][a-z]+) bends down and traces trails in the water with [hH](?:is|er) finger\. The waters sparkle with flecks of azure light\.$

Script.name: Overgrowth Functions
Script.script:
ogchannel = "clan seg tell" ogleader = "Sondayga" ogquicktarget = "none"
function ognote(msg) cecho("
<brown>(<green>OverGrowth<brown>)<green>: <snow>"..msg.."") end
function overgrow(msg,color) local len = string.len(msg) local color2 = color or "lime_green" local color = color or "sea_green"
cecho("
<"..color.."><>---"..string.rep("-",len).."---<>") cecho("
<"..color..">| <"..color2..">"..msg.."<"..color.."> |") cecho("
<"..color..">| <"..color2..">"..msg.."<"..color.."> |") cecho("
<"..color..">| <"..color2..">"..msg.."<"..color.."> |") cecho("
<"..color.."><>---"..string.rep("-",len).."---<>") end
function OGcaution(name,msg) local namelen = string.len(name) local msglen = string.len(msg)
cecho("
<yellow><>---"..string.rep("-", namelen).."-"..string.rep("-", msglen).."---<>") cecho("
<yellow>| <red>"..string.upper(name).."<yellow>"..msg.." |") cecho("
<yellow>| <red>"..string.upper(name).."<yellow>"..msg.." |") cecho("
<yellow>| <red>"..string.upper(name).."<yellow>"..msg.." |") cecho("
<yellow><>---"..string.rep("-", namelen).."-"..string.rep("-", msglen).."---<>") end
function OGwarning(name,msg) local namelen = string.len(name) local msglen = string.len(msg)
cecho("
<red><>---"..string.rep("-", namelen).."-"..string.rep("-", msglen).."---<>") cecho("
<red>| <yellow>"..string.upper(name).."<red>"..msg.." |") cecho("
<red>| <yellow>"..string.upper(name).."<red>"..msg.." |") cecho("
<red>| <yellow>"..string.upper(name).."<red>"..msg.." |") cecho("
<red><>---"..string.rep("-", namelen).."-"..string.rep("-", msglen).."---<>") end
function segtell(msg) if ogchannel == "off" then else send(""..ogchannel.." "..msg) end end
function round(num, idp) local mult = 10^(idp or 0) return math.floor(num * mult + 0.5) / mult end
function is_target(name) if string.lower(name) == target then return true else return false end end
